__TOC__

Purpose of this page is to articulate the specific images that will be produced as part of Natty, and the key contacts for each.  Based on <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-qa-n-testing-different-architectures|discussion at UDS-N]]</nowiki>, only images that have testers signed up for them will be released in Natty.  Based on the identification of contacts for testing and resolving build issues, this information will feed into updates for the iso tracker and the release manifest.   

Ideally,  all images to be produced should have their contacts identified by Feature Freeze.  For Natty,  since we're rolling out this process for the first time,  we'll go with what is signed up for at Beta Freeze.
